title: Betim Berisha (BBI Autosport)
description:
Betim Berish is the co-founder of BBI Autosport, which specializes in building high-performance Porsches for the street and track. They just broke the Pikes Peak Hillclimb Record for the Time Attack class, by a massive 14 seconds. Betim is here to tell us how it all came about.

 

Watch them build the car in only 22 days! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pkLnlErBQKQ

 

Watch the podcast! https://youtu.be/-HOUdagM2vk

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman 

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman @bbiautosport @betim.berisha

 

New Shirts: https://www.blipshift/com/tst
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
